section.p: The template is used for capturing ECG results.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:481)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:482)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:483)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of ECG test result items. [SDTM: EGSEQ, EGREFID, EGSPID], [SEND: EGSEQ, EGREFID, EGSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:484), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECG Test Type C71153 STATIC (CONF:485)
A coded value that indentifies the measurement, test, or examination whose result is being conveyed. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: EGTESTCD, EGTEST], [SEND: EGTESTCD, EGTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:486)
The reference property of the ED data type is used to capture the file name and path for the external ECG waveform file. [SDTM: EGXFN], [SEND: EGXFN]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:487), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1532)
Used to indicate whether the activity - performance of the ECG - did occur. Use statusCode "Completed" if the use occurred. [SDTM: EGSTAT], [SEND: EGSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:488)
The performance date of the ECG test. [SDTM: EGDTC], [SEND: EGDTC, EGENDTC]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:489)
Captures the ECG measurement or finding as up to three observation values. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. The value set ECG Test Result Type should be used for coded findings. [SDTM: EGORRES, EGORRESU, EGSTRESC, EGSTRESN, EGSTRESU], [SEND: EGORRES, EGORRESU, EGSTRESC, EGSTRESN, EGSTRESU]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:490)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:491)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the ECG result.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:492)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the ECG test result.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:493), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECG Test Method C71151 STATIC (CONF:494)
Capture the method of the ECG test. [SDTM: EGMETHOD], [SEND: EGMETHOD]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:495)
Captures the location - on the subject's body - of a lead used for collecting ECG information.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:511)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:512)
An observation of the actual lead location.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:513)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:516)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:514)/@code="C87881" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:515)
A code that indicates the observation contains information regarding the ECG lead that the result relates to.
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:517), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECG Lead Location C90013 STATIC (CONF:518)
Provides information on the lead location associated with the reported ECG result. [SDTM: EGLOC], [SEND: EGLOC]
An observation of the actual lead location.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:496)
Used to record the organization performing the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:497)
Used to record the role played by the person providing the value of a subjective finding.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Finding Evaluator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.84)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:498)
Records the position of the subject at the time of measurement.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Position of Subject (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.69)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:499)
A record of the consciousness state of the subject at the time of measurement.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:519)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:520)
An observation of the state of consciousness.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:521)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:524)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:522)/@code="CStbd" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:523)
A code value that indicates that the observation is that of consciousness state.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:525), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Consciousness State CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:526)
A coded value that indicates the state of consciousness of the subject when the ECG measurement was recorded. [SEND: EGCSTATE]
An observation of the state of consciousness.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:500)
Captures the planned study day for making an observation or recording a finding.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.68)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:501)
A reference to the study days corresponding to the time period of the observation.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.82)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:502)
Orients the performance of the ECG test with respect to a study defined timepoint.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)

SHOULD contain [0..3] interpretationCode (CONF:503), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:504)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). In particular, it is used to note if an observation is a baseline value, if it is derived, and/or if it should be excluded from tabulation of results. [SDTM: EGBLFL, EGDRVFL, EGEXCLFL], [SEND: EGBLFL, EGDRVFL, EGEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:505)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:506)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:507)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:508)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:509)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:510)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)

SHALL satisfy: Use the PQR type. Capture the numeric result in standard units as value and unit, capture the numeric result in the orginal units as a translation. Note, this is only necessary if the original result does not use the standard units. (CONF:479)

SHALL satisfy: Use the CE type. Capture the character result in standard units as code and code system, capture the character result in the orginal units as a translation. Note, this is only necessary if the original result does not use the standard format. (CONF:480)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:481)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:482)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:483)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of ECG test result items. [SDTM: EGSEQ, EGREFID, EGSPID], [SEND: EGSEQ, EGREFID, EGSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:484), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECG Test Type C71153 STATIC (CONF:485)
A coded value that indentifies the measurement, test, or examination whose result is being conveyed. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: EGTESTCD, EGTEST], [SEND: EGTESTCD, EGTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:486)
The reference property of the ED data type is used to capture the file name and path for the external ECG waveform file. [SDTM: EGXFN], [SEND: EGXFN]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:487), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1532)
Used to indicate whether the activity - performance of the ECG - did occur. Use statusCode "Completed" if the use occurred. [SDTM: EGSTAT], [SEND: EGSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:488)
The performance date of the ECG test. [SDTM: EGDTC], [SEND: EGDTC, EGENDTC]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:489)
Captures the ECG measurement or finding as up to three observation values. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. The value set ECG Test Result Type should be used for coded findings. [SDTM: EGORRES, EGORRESU, EGSTRESC, EGSTRESN, EGSTRESU], [SEND: EGORRES, EGORRESU, EGSTRESC, EGSTRESN, EGSTRESU]

SHOULD contain [0..3] interpretationCode (CONF:503), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:504)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). In particular, it is used to note if an observation is a baseline value, if it is derived, and/or if it should be excluded from tabulation of results. [SDTM: EGBLFL, EGDRVFL, EGEXCLFL], [SEND: EGBLFL, EGDRVFL, EGEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:493), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECG Test Method C71151 STATIC (CONF:494)
Capture the method of the ECG test. [SDTM: EGMETHOD], [SEND: EGMETHOD]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:490)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:491)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the ECG result.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:492)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the ECG test result.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:495)
Captures the location - on the subject's body - of a lead used for collecting ECG information.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:511)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:512)
An observation of the actual lead location.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:513)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:516)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:514)/@code="C87881" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:515)
A code that indicates the observation contains information regarding the ECG lead that the result relates to.
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:517), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECG Lead Location C90013 STATIC (CONF:518)
Provides information on the lead location associated with the reported ECG result. [SDTM: EGLOC], [SEND: EGLOC]
An observation of the actual lead location.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:496)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)
Used to record the organization performing the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:497)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Finding Evaluator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.84)
Used to record the role played by the person providing the value of a subjective finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:498)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Position of Subject (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.69)
Records the position of the subject at the time of measurement.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:499)
A record of the consciousness state of the subject at the time of measurement.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:519)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:520)
An observation of the state of consciousness.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:521)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF:524)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:522)/@code="CStbd" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:523)
A code value that indicates that the observation is that of consciousness state.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:525), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Consciousness State CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:526)
A coded value that indicates the state of consciousness of the subject when the ECG measurement was recorded. [SEND: EGCSTATE]
An observation of the state of consciousness.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:500)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.68)
Captures the planned study day for making an observation or recording a finding.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:501)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.82)
A reference to the study days corresponding to the time period of the observation.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:502)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)
Orients the performance of the ECG test with respect to a study defined timepoint.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:505)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:506)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:507)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:508)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:509)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:510)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.

SHALL satisfy: Use the PQR type. Capture the numeric result in standard units as value and unit, capture the numeric result in the orginal units as a translation. Note, this is only necessary if the original result does not use the standard units. (CONF:479)

SHALL satisfy: Use the CE type. Capture the character result in standard units as code and code system, capture the character result in the orginal units as a translation. Note, this is only necessary if the original result does not use the standard format. (CONF:480)

<templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.33"/> <id root="674578687" extension="MDHT"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <methodCode code="725257954"/> <participant> <participantRole classCode="ASSIGNED"> <templateId root="null"/> </participantRole> </participant> <participant> <participantRole classCode="ASSIGNED"> <templateId root="null"/> <code code="C87881" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation> <code code="CStbd" </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode code="638810439"/> <methodCode code="1883390035"/> <participant/> <entryRelationship typeCode="REFR"/> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42"/> <code code="C83204" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </act> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus" displayName="Reason for non completion"/>
